reference.title: cxxEnumerationNameLookup
reference.shortdesc: Provides a unique identifier of the enumeration.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxEnumerationNameLookup> element provides a way of uniquely identifying a enumeration in a body of DITA XML that describes a body of C++ source code.

The free format PCDATA text should:
be unique within a set of DITA XML files.
be human readable.
generally follow the lookup techniques use in the C++ standard (ISO/IEC 14882:2003(E)).
use a reversible encoding.
